crowdcontrol.proposal.explanatory.letter: Type the letter of the option you want in chat!
crowdcontrol.proposal.explanatory.number: Type the number of the option you want in chat!
config.crowdcontrol.title: Crowd Control
config.crowdcontrol.password.name: Password
config.crowdcontrol.password.description:
Default password that Crowd Control
clients must enter to connect.
config.crowdcontrol.port.name: Port
config.crowdcontrol.port.description:
The port to listen for incoming
Crowd Control connections on. To allow
remote connections, the port must be
opened in your firewall.
config.crowdcontrol.announce.name: Announce Effects
config.crowdcontrol.announce.description:
Whether to post an alert in chat when an
effect has been activated.
config.crowdcontrol.hide_names.name: Name Visibilty
config.crowdcontrol.hide_names.descripti:
Determines where to show the names of
viewers who have purchased effects.
config.crowdcontrol.advanced_settings: Advanced settings can be found in the mod's config file.
